pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========Overview========This is a Package in which you can Extract Images,Text and Tables from 1 package* Free software: BSD 2-Clause LicenseInstallation============:: pip install alldataYou can also install the in-development version with:: pip install git+ssh://git@https://github.com/shehrozkapoor/alldata.git/shehrozkapoor/python-alldata.git@masterDocumentation=============https://python-alldata.readthedocs.io/Development===========To run all the tests run:: toxNote, to combine the coverage data from all the tox environments run:.. list-table:: :widths: 10 90 :stub-columns: 1 - - Windows - :: set PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append tox - - Other - :: PYTEST_ADDOPTS=--cov-append toxChangelog=========0.0.0 (2020-12-13)------------------* First release on PyPI.
